title: doc/code.html: test failure for example tests
body:
by **ivo.balbaert**: 
The article states that the output from:
$ go test example/newmath
is:
ok  	example/newmath

In reality (tested with Go1 on Windows 64 or Linux 64 bit) the result is:

--- FAIL: TestSqrt (0.00 seconds)
        sqrt_test.go:9: Sqrt(9) = 2.9999999999999996, want 3
FAIL
FAIL    example/newmath 0.165s

because the Sqrt function is only an approximation.
